title: Ticket #6193: collector should have a way to reset stats without restarting.
description:
There should be a way to have the collector reset it's profiling statistics without restarting. In particular, a way to reset the Max and Min values for the Miron probes would be very helpful.

Also it would be nice to have a Max for DaemonCoreDutyCycle.
remarks:
2017-Mar-15 09:32:39 by johnkn:
commit [50321] adds a knob to the collector that tells it to reset stats when it does a reconfig. RESET_DC_STATS_ON_RECONFIG will reset stats with names that start with DC as well as the collector global updates stats:

HandleQuery, HandleLocate, HandleQueryForked, etc

2017-Apr-20 10:05:09 by johnkn:
I don't think this should be documented.
